message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this asking price. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but $9,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to part with it for.  Could you do $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to go above $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
